---
title: "Manage document types"
date: last-modified
---

Customize the document types available to your organization. Document types have their own configurable and reusable templates.

::: {.callout title="Model documentation, validation report, and ongoing monitoring report document types are provided by default."} 
These stock document types cannot be deleted, only edited.
:::

::: {.attn}

## Prerequisites

- [x] {{< var link.login >}}
- [x] You are a [{{< fa hand >}} Customer Admin]{.bubble} or assigned another role with sufficient permissions to perform the tasks in this guide.[^1] 

:::

## Add document types

1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa gear >}} Settings**.

2. Under Documents, select **Document Types**.

3. Click **{{< fa plus >}} Add Document Type**.

4. Enter in the document type details:

    - Provide a **[name]{.smallcaps}** and an optional **[description]{.smallcaps}**.
    - Toggle whether this document type should be automatically created **[when model is registered]{.smallcaps}**.
    - Select the model stakeholder types[^2] that should have **[write permissions]{.smallcaps}** for this document type.
    - Toggle an optional **[default template]{.smallcaps}** for this document type.[^3]

5. Click **Create Document Type** to add your document type.

::: {.callout}
Once created, customize the available templates for your document type.[^4]

:::

## Edit or delete document types

1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa gear >}} Settings**.

2. Under Documents, select **Document Types**.

3. Edit or delete document types as desired.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### Edit document types

a. Hover over the document type you want to edit.

b. When the **{{< fa ellipsis-vertical >}}** appears under the Actions column, click on it and select **{{< fa pencil >}} Edit** to change your document type's details.

c. Click **Update Document Type** to apply your changes.

#### Delete document types

a. Hover over the document type you want to delete.

b. When the **{{< fa ellipsis-vertical >}}** appears under the Actions column, click on it and select [**{{< fa trash-can >}} Delete**]{.red} to remove the document type.

c. After you confirm, the document type will be deleted.

::: {.callout-important}
## Model documentation, validation report, and ongoing monitoring report document types are stock types and cannot be deleted.

In order to delete a document type, there must be no models using that document type.

:::

:::
